name: Law Square
goal: Law Square is an independent law firm.  Law Square provides businesses and organisations with legal advice in corporate and commercial law, M&A, privacy and data protection, real estate, banking and finance, IP law, consumer regulation, tax policy and tax dispute resolution and litigation services in and out of court (EU, Belgium and Worldwide).
interests: Budget, Communication, Competition, Consumers, Culture and media, Customs, Digital economy and society, Economy, finance and the euro, Environment, General and Institutional Affairs, Justice and Fundamental Rights, Single market, Taxation, Trade, Transport
euInitiatives: Corporate and commercial law, M&A, privacy and data protection, real estate, banking and finance, IP law, consumer regulation, tax policy , VAT, customs, excise, direct taxes, tax dispute resolution and litigation services.
